title: The Deptford Trilogy
description: Around a mysterious death is woven a glittering, fantastical, cunningly contrived trilogy of novels. Luring the reader down labyrinthine tunnels of myth, history, and magic, The Deptford Trilogy provides an exhilarating antidote to a world from where "the fear and dread and splendour of wonder have been banished."Fifth BusinessThe ManticoreWorld of Wonders
author: Robertson Davies
